Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-24747 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-24747 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.2.2-11, affected by CVE-2026-24747
